input.sentences: more people showed up to the demonstration than expected .
they began their march demanding equal rights .
it was civilized although they doubted that was the way the media would portray it .
more people came up from behind to join the march .
they made speeches with megaphones demanding to be heard by the public .
output.sentences: The protesters marched together holding up their signs.
As they walked down the road, they chanted about their feelings.
With the Capitol in the background, there was a feeling of iconography.
Traffic was stopped on Pennsylvania Avenue as the marchers made their way.
They stopped to listen to a woman with a megaphone.
